options.name: Scroll of Desiccation
options.description: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Field, Forest, or Water Terrain Feature. This Terrain Feature ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses all its rules. It is treated as Dangerous Terrain(6+) for all enemy units.

options.name: Banner of the Entombed
options.description:
-1. The bearer count towards Entombed.
If taken by a Character, the bearer gains Ambush(Open Terrain). If taken by a Rank-and-File model, the bearer’s unit gains Ambush(Open Terrain) and additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation.

options.name: Sigil of the Closed Gates
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains +1 Mob and Ghost Step.

options.name: Envoy's Banner
options.description: Autonomous. In addition: One use only. During a friendly Movement Phase, the bearer's unit's Mob is set to 8. Duration: One Turn.

options.name: Godslayer
options.description:
+1 Att, Divine Attacks, Multiple Wounds(2, towards Aegis(X+)*).
*Note that the latter also applies against models with Aegis Saves with Conditional Applications.

options.name: Scourge of Kings
options.description: Att is set to 6. Zeal(towards Characters).

options.name: Crown of the Pharaohs
options.description: Duration: One Turn. At the start of all friendly Player Turns, the wearer may lose Undying Will. If it does, choose a friendly unit within 12": this unit gains Undying Will.

options.name: Sacred Hourglass
options.description: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell that was targeting a friendly unit, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

options.name: Book of the Dead
options.description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell called Unfinished Duty: Casting Value (4+), Range 12", Aura and Augment. Duration: Instant.
Choose one of the following effects for each target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
  • One Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

options.name: Kherp Sceptre
options.description: The wielder gains Hierophant. In addition, the wielder can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(5+).

options.name: Blessed Wrappings
options.description: The bearer gains +1 HP and loses one instance of Weakness(Flaming Attacks).

options.name: Sandstorm Cloak
options.description: The wearer's Mob is set to 8, and it gains Autonomous, Fly, Sweeping Attack(2D6, Str 2, AP 1).
